title: OCE PBE servers
body: Riot I know you guys do a lot of work on the game and managing servers but see the thing is that when I want to play a new champion/ skin on the PBE I'm dealing with 234 ping unlike when I play on OCE servers with 20 ping so I was just wondering could it be possible to get individual servers for PBE cause I really don't want to experience 200 ping everytime I go on the server.

replies.body:
I don't think we have the player base to divide it even further.

We cant even get permanent 3v3.

PBE has a small playerbase as it is, and the reason it's in NA (it is not in anyway related to the NA server, it is it's own server it's just in the same physical location) because all the game dev occurs in the central offices which are in the US.

It's not really practical to have more than one PBE server population wise, nor does it really offer all that much value to the dev team feedback wise, so there's no real return on an option like that.
